scenario_text.value: Wow, it’s an actual cable car.
What a curious device.
Wooow! It goes all the way to the top!

(This looks like it’s the platform for the
cable car, but it’s pretty beat up.)

It looks every bit as run down and decrepit
as that school.
Is this thing actually working?

The cars run automatically on a schedule.
One should be here soon.

They run...automatically? Are you sure that’s
safe? I’d hate for it to snap partway up.

What?! There is no way I’m getting on that
thing!

(The cable car goes pretty high up on its way
to the top. Any fall would be deadly.)

Yeah, a fall from that height and even I’d be
done for.

We could fall?! That would be terrible!
We’d better not ride on it.

Don’t worry. The cars and the cable are both
quite sturdy. No creature’s ever broken them.
Phew... That’s a relief.

Is there no one else here? I’d expect there
would at least be a maintenance worker.
No, I never found anyone else.
Is that a problem?
No, just something I was wondering about.
Aoi, you’re not still suspicious, are you?

You can see she’s been telling the truth.
Isn’t it about time we started trusting her?
I’m...not so sure.

Well, just look at Ryo. He seems to have
warmed right up to her.
Mommy... Heheheh...
Oh, my... Heheh.
Kew...

See? What’s not to trust?
She’s been nothing but helpful.

And that’s after the way Kaito treated her.
She’s gotta be really nice.
Well, I suppose.

(She does seem nice, like Minoru says, but
I’m concerned about how Ryo is acting.)
(What do I think about this woman?)
I wish she’d join us!
I don’t trust her.
She seems nice.
Would she join us?
I wonder if she’d want to join us?

It must be hard for her being out here on her
own, and I’d like to help.

Oh, that’s a great idea! Let’s all help keep
her safe!

If that’s how Saki feels, I’ll do everything
I can to make that happen!

Yeah, and just having an adult with us would
be reassuring.
It’d be nice if she wanted to play with me.
Yeah, the more the merrier!
I don’t trust her.
Something about that woman just isn’t right.
You think so too, Takuma?

Yeah, she talked about that cable car like
she’d been studying it for a while.

And she didn’t think it was strange for it to
be running by itself. That seems weird.
This conversation is way over my head.

Yeah, I don’t really get it either, but I’m
sure Aoi is right!

It’s not really that complicated. We’re just
saying we don’t trust that woman.

But if we question her about anything, I’m
sure she’ll just put on another act.

We need to be ready for anything. Whatever
the others do, let’s stay on our guard.
Agreed.
She seems nice.
She does seem very kind, doesn’t she?

Right? Kaito was pretty mean to her, but she
didn’t even get mad.

Then she agreed to help us. She’s patient, or
at least really nice. Very mature.
Yes, she’s my mommy... Mommy is always nice.
Kew...

Ryo, Kunemon is concerned about you. Perhaps
if you were not so tense...
Shut up! I’m not your problem, okay?!

I just hope we can patch things up with Kaito
at some point.

I don’t know. He’s so crazy about Miu that
I don’t see much hope of that.
Okay, everyone, the car’s here.
Wow, so this is a cable car! It’s so cool!

I’ve never ridden on a cable car before.
This is kind of exciting!

Get in, everybody. This will take us straight
to the tower.
